name: Discord
description: Send discord messages between Brickadia and Discord
author: Aware

commands.name: !setEmoji
commands.description: Sets user's emoji to specific emoji

args.name: name
args.description: Exact name of person getting whos emoji is being set

args.name: emoji
args.description: Emoji, wrap in colons :emoji_name:, for server specific emojis use the syntax <:emoji_name:emoji_id>

args.name: name
args.description: Exact name of person getting whos emoji is being set

access.description: Comma separate list of users who can set users emojis
